content.prompt: Which of the following would best support the authorâ€™s claim at the end of the first paragraph regarding the German Question?

choices.label: The divisions of Germany and Berlin into eastern and western zones at the end of the Second World War
The expulsion of ethnic Germans from most of Eastern Europe at the end of the Second World War
The admission of West Germany into NATO as an equal member in 1955
The rapid and peaceful reunification of Germany at the end of the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
